1.0.name: wordpress/frndzk-easy-mobile-theme-switcher-with-theme-pack
1.0.description: Frndzk Mobile Theme Switcher and Theme Pack plugin automatically detects mobile device and shows mobile copatiable theme. It also detects desktop browser and shows main theme. No setup or configuration needed. Even you dont have to search for mobile themes. Frndzk mobile Theme Switcher comes with most lightweight mobile theme pack. Just install and your website will be mobilized demo plugin developed by bitto kazi
